sentences.en: Advanced dispersion technology to guaranty the homogeneity of the whole inner part.
sentences.cn: 先进的分散技术,以保证均匀的整个内部.

sentences.en: But it responded to a hostility to Islam and a craving for security and cultural homogeneity that is finding adherents across the western world — and not just on the far right.
sentences.cn: 不过，它回应了对伊斯兰的敌意和对安全及文化同质的渴望，而这两者在整个西方世界——而不仅仅是在极右翼人群中——的支持者越来越多。

sentences.en: Differentiation to general meaning is referring things transmit from homogeneity to heterogeneity.
sentences.cn: 分化在一般意义上是指事物从同质性向异质性的转变.

sentences.en: Exposing energy is adjustable, and the homogeneity of exposure is better.
sentences.cn: 曝光能量可调, 曝光均匀性更好.

sentences.en: Homogeneity a common phenomenon in the present market of household appliances.
sentences.cn: 考察现在的家电市场,同质化现象相当普遍.

sentences.en: Objective : To introduce a robust method for homogeneity of variance.
sentences.cn: 目的: 介绍一种较为稳健的方差齐性检验方法.

sentences.en: Preparation, homogeneity, stability and certification of reference material of camphor were studied.
sentences.cn: 研究了樟脑标准样品的制备 、 均匀性和稳定性及其定值方法.

sentences.en: The electricity is as the goods, have homogeneity nature.
sentences.cn: 电作为商品, 具有同质性.

sentences.en: The homogeneity of p 2 , p 8 were identified by cLC capillary liquid chromatography.
sentences.cn: 经cLC毛细管液相色谱鉴定,其中的p2,p8为单一组分.

sentences.en: The homogeneity of the coating layer was characterized by SEM and EDX.
sentences.cn: 用SEM(扫描电镜)和EDX( 能谱)分析镀层的均匀性.

sentences.en: The rhc TnI was purified to 95 % homogeneity.
sentences.cn: 经离子交换柱纯化,最终产物纯度在95%以上.

sentences.en: The theory is based on the assumption of labor homogeneity.
sentences.cn: 劳动价值论是建立在劳动同质性假设基础上的.

sentences.en: The transmittance and optical homogeneity of rapidly grown DKDP crystal were measured.
sentences.cn: 测量了快速生长出的DKDP晶体的透过率和光学均匀性.

sentences.en: There is a remarkable homogeneity between the two companies.
They are reducible to the sameness or homogeneity of a self - concerned individual.
sentences.cn: 它们被还原为 自我 关心的个人的同一或同质.

sentences.en: Unique inner - outer circulation vent design shall guarantee the high homogeneity of temperatures - midity.
sentences.cn: 独特的内外循环风道设计,能保证较高的温湿度均匀性.

sentences.en: We can reduce this by avoiding homogeneity in group composition.
sentences.cn: 在群体成分中避免同质化，可以降低这种可能性。
